Wreath to Bier of Kim Yu Sik 
   Pyongyang, May 5 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il sent a wreath to the bier of Kim Yu Sik, head of the Pyongyang Circus who is winner of Kim Il Sung Prize and People's Artiste, on Saturday, expressing deep condolences over his death.
